website_summaries.verdict: Flourishing throughout the years, the Keds Triumph Nylon reinstills its glory days by remaking the classic Keds Triumph canvas shoe into a nylon counterpart which enhances comfort and convenience. Don't be fooled by its minimal form as it can pack quite a punch regarding styling and fashion at an affordable price.Adorable and vibrant, the sneaker is an easy option for clothing as it matches most clothing combinations in a wide variety of forms. Along with other Keds sneakers, it also bears the same affordable price range.
pros: Along with the imprinted trademark of other Keds sneakers, the Triumph Nylon is also super easy to clean by just throwing in the washer
Besides that, users can wipe the dirt or grime off the shoe
The sneaker comes in two sets of laces for an added variety in style
According to some, the sneaker fits their foot size perfectly
The conformity and design of the sneaker conveniently match any clothing
The Keds Triumph Nylon also has a small form that is convenient enough to fit suitcases while traveling
Many users found the sneaker very comfortable which can be worn for long extensive walks or by standing all day
Some wearers continuously receive compliments while wearing them
A handful of reviewers mentioned that the colorways of the sneaker are good
According to a couple of wearers, the form and design of the Triumph are cute and adorable
cons: According to one user, the nylon upper does not stretch as much as the canvas which would hurt the sides of the feet and toes
The sneaker would sometimes run small and narrow for those with wide feet
Although the sneaker is best to be worn with no-show socks, the low-lying collar would tend to pull the socks inward and rub against the Achilles heel which would sometimes cause blisters

customer_reviews.title: Love these even if they are a tiny too big.
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! They are comfortable and easy to keep clean. It was a nice touch that it came with two different color laces – cream and the matching green. I ordered a 6.5 as I was worried the 6 would be too small. I totally could have gotten away with the 6, but I'd rather not deal with exchanging so I'll make due with this size. I'll be ordering more styles for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa M.

customer_reviews.title: lacking in comfort
customer_reviews.text: I do like the looks of these Keds, but they are not comfortable to wear all day. The nylon does not stretch like the canvas and hurts the sides of my feet and toes after a while. I think I will stick to canvas next time.
customer_reviews.author: sej

customer_reviews.title: and i ordered a half size plus but actually it runs perfect, you dont have to ask for a half ...
customer_reviews.text: It fits as you expected, i have read on the comments that it runs a little bit small, and i ordered a half size plus but actually it runs perfect, you dont have to ask for a half size more. I use 7.5 and i considered that if i had ordered that size it would run perfect, because i ordered an 8 but it runs a little bit large, but it is comfortable so it's ok for me
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Meza

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Keds are making a comeback! I love these shoes. They are lightweight and super comfortable and I am able to wear them all day long! I also purchased the Keds socks to wear with these. I recommend getting the socks as well, nobody wants to see your socks showing and you wouldn't want to wear without socks wither.
customer_reviews.author: Honestly Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling!
customer_reviews.text: Great sneakers. Wore these during recent trip where there were multiple days of tours and walking! These shoes did not disappoint. They match with a number of items, are easy to wipe off and best of all, they're more stylish than running sneakers when traveling in Europe. Also, they take up minimal space in a suitcase. Best shoe I've purchased in a while. And, quick shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Saavy Spender & Travel Guru

customer_reviews.title: but like with all sneakers you wear without socks
customer_reviews.text: Cute, but like with all sneakers you wear without socks, they will stink after a short time. Going to try to throw these in the wash soon.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: really like these sneakers
customer_reviews.text: really like these sneakers.. was thrown with the one cream shoe lace.. ummm supposed to be two? anyway, will wear the navy laces primarily anyway.. They're Keds so don't think you can cross train with them...
customer_reviews.author: SpaceCadet

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoe, needs a thorough break-in before all day wear
customer_reviews.text: I love my kids. These have more cushion that the tennis "original" ones but still. I wore them shopping and I regretted after about four hours. I still love how cute they are. I get many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: TheRichTia

customer_reviews.title: Nice and confortable!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a pair in the Drizzle gray color in 6 1/2 Women's size. They arrived perfectly!. Very confortables, I really like them. They came with 2 pair of laces of different color.
customer_reviews.author: maria ferreira

customer_reviews.title: I like the color but wished I could send them back ...
customer_reviews.text: There was no paper work in the box so I don't know how to send them back. I ordered the same size as the Keds I wear all the time and yet these were to big. I like the color but wished I could send them back and get a different size.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Snell

customer_reviews.title: Love these- they are very cute and the material makes ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these- they are very cute and the material makes them slightly more dressed up than a typical tennis shoe
customer_reviews.author: txMichele

customer_reviews.title: Good seller
customer_reviews.text: Packaging and item arrival 5 stars. I gave 4 for actual product. I usually love keds but these are different. They fit snug, less cushion than typical keds.
customer_reviews.author: Melasmit

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I loved these shoes but the sole started coming apart after wearing them 3 times.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Nash

customer_reviews.title: They were a great price for keds
customer_reviews.text: They were a great price for keds. If you're standing for longer than 3 or 4 hours I would suggest buying some inserts.
customer_reviews.author: M. K. Kernan

customer_reviews.title: ... shoe material is not the typical canvas it feels like the material they use for pack n' plays or ...
customer_reviews.text: The shoe material is not the typical canvas it feels like the material they use for pack n' plays or other baby furniture. This means it should nice to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Dancliff

customer_reviews.title: Loving new version of "Keds"
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit perfectly and are very comfortable to wear. The nylon 'upppers' are super comfy/
customer_reviews.author: Toodie

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for this color sneaker for a couple of years! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Angela T. Stephens

customer_reviews.title: the first day i wore them, it rained and ...
customer_reviews.text: the first day i wore them, it rained and the broke apart. I had no shoes from the first day!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These have become my new favorite run around town shoes!
customer_reviews.author: patf

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have tons of Keds in same size, these ones don't fit! Definitely run a little small.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Owen

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money!!
customer_reviews.text: Shoes came apart after first day of wearing them! Not worth the money I spent for them AT ALL!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Keds Women's Triumph Nylon Fashion Sneaker
product_meta.description: Try a new twist on classically cool style in the TRIUMPH NYLON blue sneaker from KEDS.
feature_bullets: Lace-up sneaker featuring brass-tone eyelets and contrast logo on tongue
